name: Feline's Yard
description:
GYAAAAA~!!! SHIRO!!! CATCH THAT MOUSE!!!

Play as Shiro the cat to catch pesky mouse. 

Shiro's our programmer lovely kitty who loved catching a lot things and "Play it".

Here's a photo of Shiro : 

Cat Movements

ControlControllerMove UpWMove LeftAMove RightSMove DownD

Features

Undo - You can undo your last movement so you could retrace and redo your move

Shiro thank you for everyone who played and supporting this game!

Made By Sky Drake Studio
